section.title: Singular and plural nouns
section.sectiontitle2: We use -s, -es or -ies endings for plural nouns.
section.text3a: two cars three buses four cities

section.title: Irregular nouns
section.sectiontitle: Some nouns are irregular and do not follow the rules.
section.text1: a man a woman a child a person
section.text1a: two men two women four children five people
